data_table.description: Survival File and Follow-up for All-cause Mortality, Original, Offspring, Generation 3, New Offspring Spouse, Omni 1, and Omni 2 (all cohorts) through 2014. This dataset contains validated endpoints information and should be used in conjunction with the corresponding Sequence of Events file - in this case dataset vr_soe4srv_2014_a_1027s. This dataset includes follow-up time for the following events: all-cause CVD mortality.

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant identification number.

variable.name: CVDDEATH
variable.comment: This variable describes the cause of death. Please see DATEDTH for the date of death.

variable.name: CHDDEATH
variable.description: Death due to Coronary Heart Disease (CHD)
variable.comment: This variable describes the cause of death. See DATEDTH for the date of death.

variable.name: DATEDTH
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however, coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.

variable.name: LASTSOE
variable.description: Date of the latest record in the 2015 SOE dataset (vr_soe_2015_a_0991)
variable.comment: This date is censored to 12/31/2014 if the last contact date was after 12/31/2014. Date includes month, day and year, however, coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.

variable.name: LASTATT
variable.description: Date of last exam attended through 2012
variable.comment: This date corresponds to the date the participant last attended an FHS exam. This date has been truncated to the end of 2014. Date includes month, day and year, however, coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.

variable.name: LASTCON
variable.description: Date of last contact through 2012 (This is the last time the participant was known to be alive)
variable.comment: This date is censored to 12/31/2014 if the last contact date was after 12/31/2014. This information is missing if study participant is dead. Date includes month, day and year, however, coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.
